Usage GuideÂ¶

When you first visit the site, you will be greeted with the index page. From here, you can navigate to the profiles or lettings pages.

The profiles page will show you a list of all the profiles in the database. You can click on a profile to view more details.

Then you can see the details of the profile, including the first name, last name , email, and favorite city.

The lettings page will show you a list of all the lettings in the database. You can click on a letting to view more details.

Then you can see the details of the letting, including the title and location.

oc_lettings_site
